channel.title: Light on weapon black one side graphical glitch very annoying
channel.description:
[u]I can't really show you it in text now can i? heres some pictures..[/u][/SIZE]
first image ![](upload://wWHtg2LHyBvFHrMDPExgfc2Vsbi.jpeg) Image 2 better one ![](upload://kD3OxpldvWVEo3KOJc9MuTksXAy.jpeg)
i dont know why it happens but it does and its very annoying...:zip::'(
and it doesn't just happen on the weapon side.
[u]My pc specs(all drivers updated and software like directx)[/u] [/SIZE] CPU: Quad Core Intel i5-2599K CPU @ 3.30GHz
GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460
RAM: 4GB

item.title: Light on weapon black one side graphical glitch very annoying
item.dc:creator: sourcegamer101
item.description:
Go into the console by pressing the tilde (~) key. If a window that says “console” doesn’t show up, then go to options -> keyboard, then click the ‘Advanced’ button. Click the check that says enable developer console.

Type in the ConVar “sv_cheats 1”. After doing that, type in “r_flashlightscissor 0”.

This should disable the cutting of flashlight shadows. The purpose of the command is to save up CPU/GPU memory. You’ll have to re-type the commands in every time you start the game.

Read full topic

item.title: Light on weapon black one side graphical glitch very annoying
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
It might be a source engine limitation; I remember in episode 1 you could see your gun even when it was pitch black. That may have been because they made it artificially dark, though, which I recently learned is a thing they do so you can’t just crank the gamma.
